title: Hope
occurrences: there'd be hope for me too.
I often say you should give children 10 % more hope than you have yourself.
Not matter what age, you should never take their hope away.
- But I haven't been given any hope. - We don't know that for sure.
It's incurable, but they hope it's operable.
But we hope the operation will give you more than that.
Said the timing didn't matter because there's no hope.
I have to say it. I hope for the best. But I'll be here if I'm needed.
